<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Containers </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>



</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Add magazines to the cargo space of vehicles, which can be taken out by infantry units. Once the magazine cargo space is filled up, any further addMagazineCargo commands are ignored.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature arma3</title><part><name index="1"/><value>In Arma 3, arguments for this command must be local (<template><title>EffArg</title><part><name index="1"/><value>cmd</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>arg</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>loc</value></part></template>). For global variant see [[addMagazineCargoGlobal]].</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicleName [[addMagazineCargo]] [magazineName, count] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicleName: [[Object]] - vehicle to add the magazines to </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [magazineName, count]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> magazineName: [[String]] - magazine name. See [[:Category:Weapons]] for reference about possible values. </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> count: [[Number]] - number of magazines to add </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_truck [[addMagazineCargo]] ["M16", 5];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
 
</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[addMagazineCargoGlobal]], [[addMagazine]], [[addMagazineGlobal]], [[addMagazines]], [[addMagazinePool]], [[addMagazineTurret]], [[clearMagazineCargo]], [[addWeaponCargo]], [[clearWeaponCargo]], [[getMagazineCargo]], [[addItemCargo]], [[addItemCargoGlobal]], [[addMagazineAmmoCargo]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
